review.title: “Good”
review.pros: Pros – Very flexible schedule outside of tax season; very friendly co-workers; nice boss; given increased responsibilities once you show you can handle the additional work
review.cons: Cons – No benefits at all; extremely busy and demanding during tax season; small company so once you attain a certain position, there's no room for growth within the company
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – give benefits - health insurance, life insurance, paid holidays, paid vacation based on how many years the employee has been with the company
